SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc42
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc42.network.interfaces

Interface ServerNetworkController

All Known Implementing Classes:
RmiControllerServer, SocketControllerServer
public interface ServerNetworkController
Common Interface for the Classes that host a Connection inside the Server.

  • Method Details

    • getIpAddress

      String getIpAddress()
      Getter Method for the IP Address
      Returns:
      the Server IP Address

    • getPort

      String getPort()
      Getter Method for the Port
      Returns:
      the Port (in String format)

    • setWhenReady

      void setWhenReady(Runnable runnable)
      Receives a Runnable to execute after opening the Server, mainly to trigger UI updates
      Parameters:
      runnable - the code to run

    • start

      void start() throws IOException, AlreadyBoundException
      Starts the Server
      Throws:
      IOException - if the file can't be found
      AlreadyBoundException - if there is already a Server opened on that IP and Port

    • stop

      void stop() throws NotBoundException, RemoteException
      Stop the Server
      Throws:
      NotBoundException - if there is no Server opened
      RemoteException - in case of a Connection Error

    • setCollection

      void setCollection(GameCollection collection)
      Setter Method for the List of Games
      Parameters:
      collection - the List of Games
